activities: VirtualScopics is an imaging CRO and as such will receive documentation and imaging data regarding study subjects participating in global clinical trials
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: all study subject data provided for analysis to support clinical trials
recoursemech: virtualScopics commitments to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)) or their authorized representatives.
